name: FF3 - Glasser + NASA Night Launch Theme fixer
description: Makes NASA Night Launch Theme(https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/4908) look awesome when used with the Glasser extension (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/7336).  For more Glasser fun, see this forum post: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=48&t=649449&p=4450205#p4450205
